targets.query:
from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bls_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "cpi" or r["indicator"] == "core_cpi" or r["indicator"] == "ppi")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "cpi" then "CPI"
    else if r.indicator == "core_cpi" then "Core CPI" 
    else if r.indicator == "ppi" then "PPI"
    else r.indicator
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bls_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "unemployment_rate" or r["indicator"] == "lfpr")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "unemployment_rate" then "Unemployment Rate"
    else if r.indicator == "lfpr" then "Labor Force Participation"
    else r.indicator
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bls_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "nfp" or r["indicator"] == "unemployment_rate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "nfp" then "Nonfarm Payrolls"
    else if r.indicator == "jobless_claims" then "Jobless Claims"
    else r.indicator
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bls_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "wages")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Average Hourly Earnings" }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bea_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "gdp_growth" or r["indicator"] == "pce_growth")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "gdp_growth" then "GDP Growth"
    else if r.indicator == "pce_growth" then "PCE Growth"
    else r.indicator
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bea_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "industrial_production" or r["indicator"] == "capacity_utilization")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "industrial_production" then "Industrial Production"
    else if r.indicator == "capacity_utilization" then "Capacity Utilization"
    else r.indicator
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fred_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "fed_funds_rate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Fed Funds Rate" }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treasury_yield_curve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yield")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["maturity"] == "2Y" or r["maturity"] == "10Y" or r["maturity"] == "30Y")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.maturity + " Treasury" }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treasury_curve_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "spread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric"] == "10y_2y_spread")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "10Y-2Y Spread" }))
  |> yield(name: "10y-2y Spread")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fred_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "credit_spread" or r["indicator"] == "cds_spreads")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "credit_spread" and r.grade == "investment_grade" then "Credit Spreads IG"
    else if r.indicator == "credit_spread" and r.grade == "high_yield" then "Credit Spreads HY" 
    else if r.indicator == "cds_spreads" then "CDS Spreads"
    else r.indicator
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fred_economic_data" or r["_measurement"] == "fred_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "vix" or (r["indicator"] == "option_iv" and r["term"] == "30d"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "vix" then "VIX"
    else if r.indicator == "option_iv" then "Option IV 30D"
    else r.indicator
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fred_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "equity_risk_premium")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Equity Risk Premium" }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "census_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "retail_sales")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "retail_sales" or r.indicator == "pce" then "Retail Sales"
    else if r.indicator == "pce_growth" then "Retail Sales Core"
    else "Retail Sales"
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "census_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator"] == "pce")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r.indicator == "retail_sales" or r.indicator == "pce" then "PCE"
    else if r.indicator == "pce_growth" then "PCE Core"
    else "PCE"
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "macro_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "census_economic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
